level.heading: Nonabatement of causes of action.
level.text: The enactment of this chapter shall not cause the abatement of any causes of action affecting public enactments repealed by this title.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-201.01.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "This title," referred to at the end of this section, is title XXI of D.C. Law 4-101.
